tweet: Signed an MoU today with BTU to explore using Cardano and Atala for credential verification. Also toured the Bitfury lab  https://t.co/rFppGuhAk1

We need a new term to describe assets like Libra, Ripple, EOS, Cardano, and similarly permissioned systems. The term “cryptocurrency” shouldn’t apply to these. Perhaps we can start calling them “Authocurrency”? Has a nice sound to it and makes clear they rely on an authority!

Want to learn how to use Plutus & Marlowe? They are functional programming languages for smart contracts on Cardano. Learn firsthand from the IOHK team who built these languages at this upcoming workshop on 24 June in Tel Aviv. Limited spots, RSVP here:  https://t.co/qWno6df3Rh

Bakyt Azimkanov joined the Cardano Foundation as the new Director of Global PR, Communications and Marketing. We are excited to have him lead the communications strategy to elevate the Foundation & Cardano in the industry. Welcome him in the Cardano Forum:  https://t.co/PFWOtGQnXd
Read the latest blog post from IOHK to learn about their MoU partnerships with the government of the country of Georgia and two of Georgia’s largest universities:  https://t.co/AwnmSuJYiZ

(Japanese readers) Famous comedian & crypto enthusiast Tamuken will accept #Cardano's ADA at his popular Yakiniku Tamura restaurant. @Emurgo_Japan will provide live coverage from the upcoming launch event in Tokyo! 👇
